18.ara-name: كتاب الصيد والذبائح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin 'Abdullah:"We have been forbidden from the game caught by a Zoroastrian's dog

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَيْدِ كَلْبِ الْمَجُوسِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Game Caught By A Zoroastrian's Dog
